item.title: What Is an Escape Room
item.description: So you have been hearing a lot about Escape Rooms lately but don’t know what it’s all about? I am sure if you have seen the Escape Room movie you have got the basic idea. But don’t worry if you haven’t, because today I am gonna give you a crash course on escape rooms and answer you whats and whys and hows.
